remarks: The restriction of a one-to-one onto function to an intersection maps onto the intersection of the images.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Apr-2009.)
statement: resin $p |- ( ( Fun `' F /\ ( F |` A ) : A -onto-> C /\ ( F |` B ) : B -onto-> D ) -> ( F |` ( A i^i B ) ) : ( A i^i B ) -1-1-onto-> ( C i^i D ) ) $.
